channel.title: "Error. Click for details"
channel.description:
I once shared an runescape account with somone over skype, he kept recovering so I just stopped playing on it.. long story short, I checked the Adv Log on the acc and its wearing full torva, divine, and blue phat, So I go to recover the account and it says "Error click for details" then i cant click anything and have to restart my computer.. Ive tryed doing it multiple times but it keeps saying it... I cant take a screenie of it either cus i wont be able to save it cus i cant click anything.... Whoever Successfully helps ill give them 10m RSGP if the acc recovery is succussfull.
(btw yes, i do have the latest Java and JDK)

item.title: "Error. Click for details"
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Why do I have an odd feeling this is a troll?

Read full topic

item.title: "Error. Click for details"
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Uninstall JDK and JRE then reinstall them, I guess…
Don’t use JDK 7 as I’ve heard it causes stupid ass errors.

Read full topic

item.title: "Error. Click for details"
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

You might have been infected by a RAT or some other kind of virus which can affect the way in which the client loads causing it to crash. All I can say is run a full virus scan and hope if there is any problems they are detected and dealt with. It does sound like you are being locked out of your system by a RAT if you genuinely cannot click or press anything.

Read full topic

item.title: "Error. Click for details"
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

Try using a different browser

Read full topic

item.title: "Error. Click for details"
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Account might be locked so it’s crashing your game client, either that or your computer is horrible.

Read full topic

item.title: "Error. Click for details"
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

The rules say not to share accounts. What were you thinking?

Read full topic
